page.title: 03HOLYWELL'S 2nd EASTER FAYRE
page.content: On Saturday 20th April 1985 {Holywell {Middle School}held its second annual Easter Fayre. The fun started at 11 o'clock, and the activities availiable included crockery smashing, numerous raffles and tombolas, train rides, a palmist, various stalls, archery, multi coloured hair spraying, model aeroplane flying and Morris dancing. If after all this you were feeling hungry, you could win yourself a coconut on the coconut shy, try some cakes, drop in at the canteen or buy some candy floss. Sadly the event was marred by bad weather, and this was reflected in the turn out,however the organisers - the parents and friends' association - raised much needed funds for the School. The event ended at 4 o'clock.
